member.name: T:Akka.Logger.Serilog.SerilogLogMessageFormatter
member.summary: This class contains methods used to convert Serilog templated messages into normal text messages.

member.name: M:Akka.Logger.Serilog.SerilogLogMessageFormatter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Akka.Logger.Serilog.SerilogLogMessageFormatter.Format(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Converts the specified template string to a text string using the specified token array to match replacements.
member.param: The template string used in the conversion.
The array that contains values to replace in the template.
member.returns: A text string where the template placeholders have been replaced with their corresponding values.

member.name: T:Akka.Logger.Serilog.MessageTemplateCache
member.summary: Taken directly from Serilog as the cache was internal. https://github.com/serilog/serilog/blob/master/src/Serilog/Core/Pipeline/MessageTemplateCache.cs
